attributes.action: Investigate highway maintenence and road repair workers who are over staffed
attributes.additional_details: Photos will be titled on Facebook or twitter as HIGHWAY ROBBERY IN BRITAIN
attributes.background: I drive nationwide and every other day I see 8-10 road workers watching 1 or 2 men working ,cones are on roads for months etc or workers sat in vans reading newspapers our roads are in chaos as half of these employees stand around doing nothing I have pictures to prove this issue .

rejection.details: It's not clear whether the workers you are concerned about are working for private companies or for the Government. We can only accept petitions about matters that the Government or Parliament are responsible for.
